note.p: American physician. Born and resided in Philadelphia. Treasurer of the First Association of Spiritualists (of Philadelphia), 1864.
United States Federal Census 1870 (Philadelphia, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania 111/16) (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 13 August 2019) -->
